document.ModsDocTitle: Diversity of mantids (Dictyoptera: Mantodea) of Sangha-Mbaere Region, Central African Republic, with some ecological data and DNA barcoding
document.docAuthor: Moulin, Nicolas, Decaens, Thibaud & Annoyer, Philippe
document.masterDocTitle: Diversity of mantids (Dictyoptera: Mantodea) of Sangha-Mbaere Region, Central African Republic, with some ecological data and DNA barcoding

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Diversity of mantids (Dictyoptera: Mantodea) of Sangha-Mbaere Region, Central African Republic, with some ecological data and DNA barcoding

mods:name.mods:affiliation: 82, route de l'ecole, Hameau de Saveaumare, 76680 Monterolier, France.
Centre d'Ecologie Fonctionnelle et Evolutive, UMR 5175, CNRS, Universite de Montpellier, 1919 Route de Mende, 34293 Montpellier Cedex 5, France.
Insectes du Monde Sabine, 09230 Sainte Croix de Volvestre, France.

subSubSection.paragraph:
CAR, Komassa, UV trap 07.VIII.1966 (♂) (Collector M. Boulard) (MNHN); Dzanga-Sangha Special Reserve, between Bayanga and Lidjombo, PK15, UV trap 31.V.1998 (2♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); Lidjombo, in a little bay, UV trap 05-10.II.2005 (2♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); Lidjombo, Forest, UV trap 13.II.2005 (♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); Bayanga, base camp, Tent, night capture 18-19.X.2008 (2♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); Bayanga, platform on the canopy trap 44m, "Kungu"
Piptadenastrium africanum
, Fabaceae , UV trap 23.X.2008 (♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); Bayanga, base camp, Tent, night capture 24.X.3008 (♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); Bayanga, Sangha river bank, UV trap 25.X.2008 (♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); Dzanga-Ndoki National Park, Lake 7, UV trap 28.XI.2010 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM); Lake 1, base camp, laboratory tent, night capture 29.XI.2010 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM); Dzanga-Sangha Special Reserve, Bayanga, Town, leaf, night capture 23.I.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Dzanga-Ndoki National Park, M'Boki , Sangha river bank, UV trap 25.I.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, trunk, night capture 26.I.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, UV trap 27.I.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, Remote Canopy Trap, UV trap 28.I.2012 (♂ (Collector NM and PA) (IDM); Lake 1, base camp, UV trap 29.I-02.II.2012 (4♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM and RCNM); Lake 7, UV trap 03.II.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, UV trap 07.II.2012 (2♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Likembe, Sangha river bank, UV trap 09.II.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, UV trap 10.II.2012 (2♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, laboratory tent, night capture 11.II.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, UV trap 12-13.II.2012 (2♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, laboratory tent, barcoding BOLD NMMAN11-409, night capture 14.II.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, platform on the canopy 45m, "Ayous"
Triplochiton scleroxylon
, Sterculariaceae , UV trap 15.II.2012 (2♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 3, UV trap 15-16.II.2012 (2♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, laboratory tent, barcoding BOLD NMMAN11-446 (1♂), night capture 17-19.II.2012 (2♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, day capture 22.II.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, night capture 22.II.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM); Lake 3, barcoding BOLD NMMAN11-411 and -445 (2♂) UV trap 22.II.2012 (3♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, platform on the canopy 45m, "Ayous"
Triplochiton scleroxylon
, Sterculariacae, UV trap 24.II.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 3, platform on the canopy 40m, "Sapelli"
Entandrophragma cylindricum
, Meliaceae , barcoding BOLD NMMAN11-434, UV trap 26.II.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, UV trap 26.II.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM).
